file_intent.text: This file implements a server framework using Civetweb, providing HTTP and WebSocket handling capabilities for web applications.

responsibilities.label: HTTP Request Handling
responsibilities.description: Manage various HTTP request methods (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, etc.) and route them to appropriate handlers.

responsibilities.label: WebSocket Handling
responsibilities.description: Facilitate WebSocket connections and manage data transmission for real-time communication.

responsibilities.label: Server Configuration
responsibilities.description: Initialize server settings, including context management and callback registration for handling connections.

responsibilities.label: Cookie and Header Management
responsibilities.description: Provide methods to retrieve and manipulate HTTP cookies and headers for requests.

responsibilities.label: URL Encoding
responsibilities.description: Handle URL encoding and decoding for query parameters and form data.
